short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Navigate paginated webpages using your keyboard's arrow keys. Perfect for search results, image galleries and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Page Turner detects back and next links in websites. It allows you to 'turn the page' using your keyboard's left and right arrow keys. Page Turner also prerenders next pages for fast page loads.
